Package uk.ac.nottingham.psyja2.ATCSimulator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConflictListener
    Implementable interface to listen for when conflicts between two aircraft occur
    InstructionListener
    An implementable interface for listening to an Instruction
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Aircraft
    The Aircraft class represents a single aircraft within the simulation.
    AircraftProfile
    Defines the properties and behaviour of a particular type of aircraft.
    Airway
    Represents a segment of an airway between two waypoints
    AltitudeInstruction
    An instruction to make an aircraft climb/decend to an assigned altitude
    Coordinate
    Represents a latitude and longitude coordinate
    HeadingInstruction
    Instruction to make an aircraft turn to a given heading.
    HoldInstruction
    An instruction to make an aircraft circle in it's current location.
    Instruction
    A generic instruction that provides basic methods for implementing an instruction.
    Scenario
    Represents an entire network of airways and waypoints
    Simulator
    A singleton class to represent an instance of a simulator
    SimulatorControls
    The GUI controls for the simulator
    SimulatorDisplay
    The GUI radar display for the simulator
    SpeedInstruction
    An instruction to make an aircraft reduce/increase its speed to an assigned value
    Waypoint
    Waypoint represents a single navigational waypoint used in a Scenario
    WaypointInstruction
    An instruction to make an aircraft fly directly to a navigation Waypoint When the aircraft reaches the waypoint it will continue on its current trajectory
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Waypoint.WaypointType
    An enum of the types of waypoint/navigation beacon
